page.title: 06OLD BUCKENHAM PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: The Headmaster is Mr. Cross. There are about 150 children split into 5 classes. There are 2 mobile classrooms, a field and a playground. There are 6 teachers. We have 5 days a week at school. On Wednesdays we can go to Bookshop after school. There are 3 dinner ladies. Each morning we have an assembly except Tuesday. School starts at 9.00 a.m., the first break is 10.30 - 10.45, lunch is from 12.00 to 1.15. Last break is 2.15 - 2.30. School ends at 3.30. The school year begins in September. We have 3 terms. Our first holiday is at Christmas when we have 2 weeks off. We have 2 weeks for Easter and six for summer. The subjects are maths, English, story, art, S.R.A., topic (history/geography/science), music, and Special Interest. When we are 11 we go to the High School.
